entry.title: The Good of Winter
entry.summary:
Author: riverray

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,787Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: After Merlin is rescued from slave traders, he notices Arthur and the knights aren't quite acting like themselves. He's not sure how to fix it but luckily he finds he doesn't have to.Mother Nature has a way of smoothing things over, even when in the dead of winter. +  Honestly, I'm just a sucker for Merlin and the knights showing affection. I will not apologize.

entry.title: Bite into New Golden Opportunities - BINGO
entry.summary:
Author: SixofCups

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,569Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 2

Summary: Here, I present the fills that got me my first Merthur Microfic bingo blackout! From fairytales to modern AUs, please enjoy tales of yearning and idiocy.1. Magic Bent It Where It Stood: Change, Excalibur, magical objects, non-Merthur POV2. Bites and Briars: Bite, fairytale AU, mythical creatures, first kiss, BAMF Merlin3. Past Lives Potion: Bite 2, spell instructions, spell gone wrong4. The Merlin-Arthur Action Plan - dir. Gwaine: Sacrifice, modern AU, knights of the round table, forced proximity, jealousy5. The Darkest Hour if the BBC Thought Anything About Anything: Shadow, episode fix-it, magic reveal6. If I'm Not Leading, Are We Still Dancing?: Manhandle, different first meeting, modern AU, non-Merthur POV

entry.title: Shadows of the Witch
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperedPages819

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 319,259Chapters: 86/?Kudos: 42

Summary: The fragile trust between Arthur and Merilyn is no longer a secret hope—it is real, tangible, and dangerously alive. For the first time, Arthur sees magic not as a weapon, but as part of the woman he loves. Their bond deepens, even as the shadow of destiny presses closer. But love does not erase the weight of prophecy, nor the enemies waiting to tear them apart. Yet the greatest revelation lies not in vengeance, but in blood. Merilyn’s long-buried secret, her son emerges into the light. His existence changes everything: for Merilyn, for Arthur, and for the destiny of Camelot itself. Whispers of the boy ripple through the Old Religion, binding his fate to the same prophecy that foretells Arthur’s rise and Merilyn’s sacrifice. Allies will question her loyalty. Enemies will seek to use him. And Arthur must decide if love can survive the truth that destiny has hidden from them both.

entry.title: When I'm 6 Feet Under and the Bugs are Eating my Heart, All they will Taste is You
entry.summary:
Author: Ap_1238

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,043Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: This is me simply trying to cope the heartbreak that was the finale of Merlin. I watched this show years ago and was distraught to see an edit pop back up. I'll be real, I cried for 2 days straight----The feeling of grief is hard to define.For Arthur Pendragon it was losing everything he thought he had.If only he could see the gold in the night sky.ORthe eyes of someone he loves.----Post season 5 finale. He's not DEAD.Arthur trying to cope with all the pressure.He has a kingdom to rule, a wife to love.But how can he do that if he can't figure out what is in his own heart.----OK IM MAKING THIS SEEM SO ANGSTYIT'S CUTE AND FUNNY TOO I PROMISE*Note: If you are uncomfortable with the idea of Mpreg please do not fret. I'm trying to make this story so you can feel a resolution without feeling pressured to read the whole. For the rest of the freaks (me too babe) I hope you enjoy this beatiful coping mechanism!

entry.title: A straight approach to being queer
entry.summary:
Author: SueRose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,179Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 45

Summary: NEW TITLE SAME STORY! Formally known as: "...How to be not straight (for very good reasons)" Rich nepo boy Arthur Pendragon joins his university's queer club. And pretends to be queer, because he needs to write a paper about queer representation. But.... He has not expected this. This being the leader of the club, namely Merlins Emrys, who does not believe a word he says. Will he be able to appear queer enough to his new peers? Or will all.of this end up in a giant disaster?

entry.title: Numbered by Fate
entry.summary:
Author: SpikyPotato

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,777Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: Leora had little magical ability, except for one skill that she was born with. Everyone is assigned a number 1-10 at birth that floats over their heads, gleaming in the light. At first, she was not sure what this represented but as she grew, she realized that the number was their value as a person. It was a mixture of their power, intelligence, compassion, and their destiny. The Once and Future King was destined to be a perfect 10, a number completely unheard of. What number would Emrys have?

entry.title: He Never Thinks Of Me (Except When I'm On TV)
entry.summary:
Author: s0ngbirds

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,497Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “You need to stop whatever the hell this is.” ​ Merlin looked into Arthur's eyes as he said this, frustration crawling across his body. He folded his arms across his chest. This wasn't the first time this topic had come across their arguments; the existence of it was a constant grating against their relationship. Arthur had been in Merlin's life forever, it felt. Since middle school, the two had been inseparable, the boys meeting in their shared English class, Arthur the pompous athletic brute who karted all over the world and Merlin the weird kid with the ears. Or The boys break up and then 5 years later Arthur is a Formula One Driver for Camelot Racing and Merlin runs a coffee shop and they pine for each other

entry.title: I Always Come When You Call
entry.summary:
Author: braceyourself

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 723Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 43

Summary: Merlin remembers, sort of. He recalls the panic and chaos of the battle, the dread of realising Camelot’s forces were vastly outnumbered, of knowing innately what had to be done even though he couldn’t name it. He remembers locking eyes with Arthur, seeing the moment his king registered what must have been an expression of grim apology on his Court Sorcerer’s face. The widening of dismayed eyes, the alarmed, half-formed forbiddance on his lips, and it all gets a bit muddled after that.

entry.title: Lessons in pleasure
entry.summary:
Author: Ace_Teagirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,537Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 199

Summary: “One of my girls mentioned she saw a new face at the market today. A pretty boy looking for employment. I have a proposition for you, if you want to accompany me inside,” the woman said. Her voice was warm and her smile almost motherly. It made Merlin ache for the comfort of his home. He looked at her uncertainly. Merlin may have had a sheltered upbringing in his small farming village, but he could imagine what kind of work she had to offer him, and he wasn’t sure he wanted it. Still, he stood up, shaking slightly from hunger and exhaustion. There was something in this woman’s eyes that compelled Merlin to trust her.
